skillTree.localised_description: A larger more powerful variety of its lesser bretheren

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Animated by Dark Magic, a zombie dragon is an unholy parody of a once-noble beast now borne aloft by great tattered wings, its body covered with thick, withered hide.

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death
Using a combination of their great strength and amazing speed, its easy for a Vampire to create a gap in their opponents guard.
The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.

skillTree.localised_name: Woe To All But The Worthy!
skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions regret their rash pride after the valiant challenge they issued is accepted by a creature whose eyes are the eyes of death itself.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: A true knight will never abandon his armour; sometimes the steel skin appears to be part of his body.
The moonlight pulsates with an otherwordly power.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ever searching for a worthy opponent, only the most skilled shall ever have a chance of drawing blood from I
Fury is a tool, to revel in it is weakness.
Through eons of violence, one must be careful lest they fall into insanity. Pledge yourself instead to the thrill of perfection and not the act itself
The cattle rise and fall like grains of sand, we however, endure forever in our pursuit of total martial mastery.

nodes.localised_description: The true objective ofant disciple of the wanderer is the perfection of their martial craft through near continous combat.
Those who drawn to Walach's quest of annihlation share in his vision and beilief that the time has come to stamp out once and for all humanity's weakness.
